description:
Akudarma arrive to the Republic of Florence in the 16th century, and meet da Vinci, who welcomes them with open arms. However, upon closer inspection, they see that there are even more hands and feet behind him... There are 24 people behind him! Tokio and Calen are also surprised, but they are suddenly thrown into a mecha battle. They go in with Bokan Dragon, but Akudarma powers up with a secret weapon and they get blown away. They quickly Time Bokan and manage to get away, but apparently da Vinci followed them to the 24th century?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tensai Da Vinci ga Saishuukai Datta!
The Genius da Vinci Was the Final Episode!
天才ダ・ヴィンチが最終回だった!
